managerUpdate: we game them the rfi summary report. awaiting response
aiSummary: This quarter, the WBI team continued its collaboration with the F-35 Directorate to address critical workforce shortfalls hindering mission readiness.  Following a comparative analysis revealing significant gaps between F-35 and legacy platform workforce capacity, WBI facilitated the delivery of a comprehensive RFI summary report to key stakeholders.  This report, informed by WBI's expertise in manpower modeling and assessment, represents a crucial first step in developing a strategic workforce optimization model designed to align F-35 resources with evolving program demands and ensure optimal mission effectiveness.  We await stakeholder response to proceed with the next phase of model development.
